sourcesContent:
import "./Form.css"; import React from 'react' function ProductForm() { const[formData,setFormData]=React.useState({ name:"", description:"", price:"", contact:"", image_url:"", }) function handleChange(event){ setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } function handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); fetch("/products",{ method:"POST", headers:{ "Content-Type":"Application/JSON", }, body:JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=>console.log(data)) setFormData("") } return (

Product Information
